name: Erde: Nezu no Izuki no Shita de
synopsis: Tamuki lives an ordinary life in an ordinary village. One day, a motorcycle crushes into his house. Yoko, a traveler, caused the accident. He is going to stay at Tamuki's house for a while to recover. Yoko is trying to 'see everything in the wide world'. While living together, Yoko is inspiring Takumi to think about his own path.
